content.rendered:
Effective solid particle filter: The BOGE F 95-2 M depth filter removes solid particles down to 0.01 microns with a collection efficiency of 99.9999% from compressed air or pressurized nitrogen gas. Highly effective microfiber fleeces have a high capacity to absorb dirt, while at the same time providing a consistently low differential pressure. A pleated depth filter increases the filter area by a factor of 4.5 compared with conventional elements. The design of the filter housing and the filter element is optimized to allow the flow to have the lowest possible pressure resistance.

PRODUCT

Micro filter

ADVANTAGES

  • 10-year guarantee on housing
  • Constantly low differential pressures
  • EU-VO 1935/2004 exemption certificate
  • Simple, space-saving installation
  • Suitable for use with foodstuffs in accordance with FDA Title 21 CFR
  • Validated in accordance with ISO 12500 -1:2007 & ISO 8573 -1:2010
